attributes.action: Admit he has lied about future cuts in expenditure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Brown knows that there will be cuts in future government expenditure.

His government has printed this will happen.

He lies to mask the truth and evade his responsibility.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action. According to our Terms and Conditions we can not accept words such as admit or explain as a request for action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
